title: The Incredible Story of the Traveling Creole
description:
Enslaved people developed a hybrid language that sailed from Africa to the Caribbean and—unbelievably—back again.
Slate Plus members get a bonus segment on Lexicon Valley each week, and no ads. Sign up now to listen and support our show.
